1.content:
Pick the character that you wish to make it more stronger.

Only male and Robin and Cyborg is excluded for being too weird....................................
1.title: Choice

choices: He want to save it until he fight someone but.......Something happens it broke
He switched to the Max increase in mass
11.content:
Red X were busy trying the new suit he got and all of the sudden, he found a red button on the center of his suit that he wore[THE RED X SUIT].

Hmm...... I wonder what this button does?

The moment Red X pushes the button a Menu of the selection of the program are shown on his suit.

It reads "MASS INCREASE"(MUSCLE MASS)

Wow this could be fun" Red X said to himself.

HE push the increase button and the suit asked him to state where would the mass would be increased and by how much....
11.title: Red X

choices: A microchip to enhance his physical state
An Engineered Serum to increase his strength
A remote to control any part of limbs either increase or decrease
12.content:
Slade were always getting beaten up by the Titans. He felt very weak as he was able to lose to a wimp like the pathetic Beastboy.

So in attempt to not be defeated again, he created something to give him an edge while fighting the Titans so that he wont lose ever again.

He created......
12.title: Slade

123.content: Slade had created a steroid that would increase the muscle mass of anyone that ate it. However, Slade was no fool: he needed to test it to see if there were still any kinks in his creation. He needed a test subject...the only question is, who?
123.title: When in doubt, go with genetics!

choices: Starts to bulks up at a rapid pace....
Turns into a grotesque musclebound creature....Start losing sanity..
1231.content:
His minions would be a perfect test subject as they would obey his command without any disobeying.

He calls one of his minion to the testing chamber, and as to his unknowing the minion that shown up there was a new comer. He thought that by being of a service to Slade would increase his chance of becoming the leader of the minions rather than being a new squirt that being pushed around all the times.....

Ok, so you are Minion-245 right? Now rest your body on top of the examination table and we can start right out...

Um... Ok..

Ok this might gave you a little unpleasant feeling..

As the syringe filled with the super steroid start to fill the veins of Minion-245 a warm sensation starts to fill its body....

Hmm... Mr Slade sir, why did I get the feeling like my skin is tightening?

The mischievous Slade only replies with a fine gesture and said " Yes you might feel a little stretched..."

Ouh... Ok....

At that very moment, Minion-245 felt a sharp stabbing sensation throughout his body. As he screamed in pain, Slade watch Minion-245's tranformation with a glee in his eyes....

The Minion....
1231.title: One of his minions.

12313.content: The minion that had been used in the test had been turned into a muscle-bound being, as Slade had hoped, but the transformation had a few...unexpected side effects. The minion had become stronger, but, during the growth, some of his bones had grown and burst clean out of his skin. His sanity, it seemed, had also been deteriorated, as the personnel trying to drag him away were killed and then devoured. "Hmm..." said Slade "perhaps more work is required".
12313.title: This doesn't look good...

123131.content: Slade had finished making some adjustments to his Serum. Another test subject was brought into the laboratory and was strapped to the prepping table, but now Slade had prepare for the incident like the last time he tested the drug. He isolated the test room inside a titanium reinforced room. As he begin his test....
123131.title: Some time later...

13.content:
There he goes Titans GO!" Robin shouted to the rest

"on it" Beast boy replied while shifting into a Crow to chase Slade.

Beast boy followed Slade to an allyway unaware of what was about to happen

"you have been a thorn in my side for too long" Slade said "Wha?" Beast Boy said to him."Here's a gift " the voice replied while pulling out a ray gun

"what are yo-" Beast Boy never finished as he was shot with the gun

"have fun beast boy" the voice said to Beast Boy as it walked off

------------------------------At the tower---------------

"wha- where am I?" Beast boy mumbled

"We found you in an allyway out cold so we brought you back to the tower" Raven said in her usual monotone

"ok im just gonna go to my room now" Beast Boy mumbled as he trudged to his room "i feel weird today maybe it will be gone by tomorrow" Beast Boy sighed as he drifted off to sleep
13.title: Beastboy

choices: Is suprissed by beast boys muscles
Reality changes to where beast boy always had huge muscles
131.content: Beast boy had woken up very early to look at the ray gun he saw rapid muscle growth on the side of the gun and thought to test it on himself he shot himself and his muscle start to inflate to bigger sizes beast boy heard a noise and Raven comes in she...
131.title: Rapid muscle growth
